prov:entity.attribute:caption: Thermodynamic Diagnostic Tool - Monthly mean vertical entropy production (lat, lon) fieldsfor model CNRM-CM6-1.

prov:entity.attribute:description: Recipe for the computation of various aspects associated with the thermodynamics of the climate system, such as energy and water mass budgets, meridional enthalpy transports, the Lorenz Energy Cycle and the material entropy production.
